titleInfo.title: Letter No. 86 to Rawson Hart Boddam, President and Governor for the Political and Secret Department, Council at Bombay, from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter notes the arrival of the ScorpionSnow (under command of Captain John Thistleton) and the movements of the French frigate, the Venus. It is noted that the letter was sent with copies of several recent correspondences (including with the Shaikh of Congoon [Kangān]). The letter includes an update of the political situation in Persia and notes that the roads between Bushire and Sherauz [Shiraz] and Isfahan [Eşfahān] remain open. Other matters are also discussed, including the destruction of some packets from Bussora [Basra].
